mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.price AS "price", a.category_id AS "categoryId", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.reference_flag AS "referenceFlag", a.owner AS "owner"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bj_examination_package( id, name, price, category_id, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, reference_flag, owner ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{price}, #{categoryId}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{referenceFlag}, #{owner} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bj_examination_package SET name = #{name}, price = #{price}, category_id = #{categoryId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, reference_flag = #{referenceFlag}, owner = #{owner} WHERE id = #{id}
